name: Roll the Ball: Hidden Path
description:
Do you like the game genres as below? Great! Roll the Ball: Hidden Path puzzle has all the elements. ;)
• Puzzle Games, Thought-provoking fun.
• Maze Puzzle Games, Escape the maze.
• Brain Teasers, Test yourself. Exercise your brain.
• Physics Puzzler, Physics-based gaming.
• Match-3 Puzzle, Easy to learn but hard to master.
• Retro Games, Revisit the classics
• Exam Prep & Tutoring, Practice makes perfect. Train you brain to active mind.
• Family Puzzle Games, Enjoy the game with your family

HOW TO PLAY
• Roll your ball by tapping on any tiles just next to the ball on which you wish the ball to pass!
• Each tile has a number carved on stating the number of times the ball can pass over.
• Final goal is to leave no numbered tiles left as your ball makes its way to the red goal!

FEATURES
• Tiles, balls, and your WILL(variable) to play!
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline anytime.
• Clean UI/UX for everyone to enjoy!
- Soft SE and vivid visual effects
• OPTIMIZED for both iPhone and iPad.

NOTES
• "Roll the Ball: Hidden Path" contain ads like banner, interstitial and video ads.
• "Roll the Ball: Hidden Path" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and in-game currency to buy hints alike.
